Jacob Wheat - Mayor
===================

### [Contact Us](https://www.cityofalvarado.org/Directory.aspx)

1. #### Jacob Wheat

   Mayor

   [Email Jacob Wheat](mailto:wheatj@cityofalvarado.org)

   Phone: [817-821-9240](tel:8178219240)
2. #### City of Alvarado-Elected Officials

   **Physical Address**
   View Map   
   104 W College Street  
   Alvarado, TX 76009
